attributes.action: force every member of the labour party who has submitted a bogus expenses claim to resign their seat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that every member of parliament has a responsibility for their actions and where it is shown, either by their own actions of repaying wrongly claimed taxpayers money, or by another body ordering the repayment of wrongly claimed expenses, that member has abused their elected position and should be forced to resign their seat in parliament.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as references to political parties. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
